column5: API endpoint for JSON GET requests per restaurant
API endpoint for JSON GET requests per menu item.
Handle creation of a new menu item in the database. Answer POSTs by writing user input to the database. Answer GETs by returning the newmenuitem.html file to the client.
Handle updates to existing menu items in the database. Answer POSTs by writing user input to the database. Answer GETs by returning the editmenuitem.html file to the client.

Handle deletions of existing menu items in the database. Answer POSTs by deleting the row in the MenuItem table of the database which the user specified with two numeric arguments. Answer GETs by returning the deletemenuitem.html file to the client.
